content.rendered:
The ONE Move Only Great Ball Strikers Figured Out (That Fixes Dang Near All Your Swing Issues in a Single Day)

Sign up to the webinar!

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod.

INSTANT ONLINE ACCESS NOW AVAILABLE

Let’s start with the details of the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix first…

20 Minute Shallowing Fix Video Series

The step-by-step core videos that will have you shallowing every swing and hitting the most solid shots of your life before your next round.

60 Seconds to Shallowing

These are super short summaries of the drills presented in the core series above, for quick reference… even between holes if needed!

Coach Clay in Your Ear

Audio-only instruction where I support you through the program, just like a caddie does for a Tour pro in the lead on the back nine on Sunday.

Perfect Practice Plan Workbook

Printable PDF document you can take to the range so you can easily track all your progress.

Plus Your 3 Limited Time Bonuses

Guide to the Top 3 Training Aids for Shallowing the Club in 2022

Don’t waste your money on another training aid that doesn’t work. I’ll give you honest video reviews of the top training aids I’ve come across.

How to Dominate With a Draw

With your new superpower of turning the ball over from right-to-left, you’ll have to play the course a little differently. This video will have you dominating the course.

The Shallowing Sessions

Watch me give real lessons to a couple of students. While I try to be as perfect as possible in the core videos, some things get said a little differently in live action, of course, giving you another opportunity for “aha” moments.

Frequently Asked Questions

That’s just for the 20 Minute Shallowing Fix!

Here’s EVERYTHING else you’re getting with this incredible limited time offer…
